posts.post_title: 1888 Henderson Black Mount N173 for Sale
posts.post_content:
Rare black mount N173 exhibiting an outdoor Brooklyn pose. Great condition---$5500. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

Thanks--Jay
Beautiful cabinet . . .  great condition, colored mount, outdoor pose.  Not my team but a terrific N173.
So nice.  Glad I got to see it, thank you.  GL with the sale.
